We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private CommodityChannelIndex _cci;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_cci = CCI(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_cci.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "CCI Typical Price Average", _cci.TypicalPriceAverage);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CCI Typical Price Mean Deviation", _cci.TypicalPriceMeanDeviation);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CCI Current", _cci.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.cci = self.CCI(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.cci.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CCI Typical Price Average", self.cci.TypicalPriceAverage);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CCI Typical Price Mean Deviation", self.cci.TypicalPriceMeanDeviation);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CCI Current", self.cci.Current);
